title: Frozen Past
description:
Frozen Past
 – A Thriller  Luke is young. Eliana is his whole world and for someone his age, the burden is immense. You see, Eliana is being stalked. Stalked by a madman who wants nothing more than to see her dead.  The madman knows things that no one should know and sees things that no one should see. He tells them if they say a word to anyone, they will both die. And Luke can’t let that happen.  Eliana’s past is catching up with her and Luke must do anything to save her.  Anything.
author: Richard C. Hale
